column4: Hey all. I've just reinstalled karmic and I need some help. The screen is bigger than my monitor, so I'm only seeing the top left of the screen. I've been into system>preferences>display but none of the settings there worked. Every setting but the one I'm on turned everything into lines
It's weird because the openchrome drivers are installed, and that's what my laptop needs
crtl+alt+F1 >login>sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg. maybe it helps
after that restart Xserver: sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart for ubuntu
